description: Tried to do 20 builds inside of a minute. This will fail about 10 builds in because of the hard limit on POST operations. This is expected. However, the spec says I should see a 413 error and I am getting a 403 forbidden instead.
title: When hitting the absolute limit I am getting a 403 instead of 413

comments.content: Tried to do 20 builds inside of a minute. This will fail about 10 builds in because of the hard limit on POST operations. This is expected. However, the spec says I should see a 413 error and I am getting a 403 forbidden instead.
